basically you take the control system

is that you have some kind of specific
Hardware platform uh sometimes referred
to as a Dack or data acquisition
Hardware that basically takes all of the
wires coming out of the device under
test and all the electrical signals and
then converts that um through some
software into Data that the models can
consume uh and then the models basically
kind of do a similar thing on the way
out um where they basically talk to the
data acquisition hardware and then that

under test inputs and so uh that's
